title: Bloomberg Markets: Haverford's Smith on Confidence in Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Haverford's Smith on Confidence in Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Hank Smith\u0010Chief Investment Officer\u0010Haverford Trust \u0010Discussing the two factors leading bullish sentiment in the markets; the global recovery and accelerating earnings.
